Detailed Description

Map class

Parameters:

gridData The raw grid data array.
gridBuild The build data array.
maxLocations The location steps in grid.
baseX The baseX location in the grid.
baseY The baseY location in the grid.
index The index number of this grid.
imageGeneral1 The image of roadGeneral1 (Forest) element.
imageGeneral2 The image of roadGeneral2 (Water) element.
imageGeneral3 The image of roadGeneral3 (Brigde) element.
